Name: High Performance Cluster Computing based MapReduce
Description: Researching machine learning algorithms in MapReduce paradigm on OpenMP/MPI based distributed HPC systems using Containerized C++17 environments

Name: Application of Neuroevolution in Autonomous Cars
Description: Presented at IVCPS conference at VIT Chennai. To be published in Springer. Research on the application of NeuroEvolution in self driving cars simulated using Unreal Environment and NEAT algorithm.

Name: Deep Residual Network Based Food Recognition for Enhanced Augmented Reality Application
Description: Research on real-time integration of Deep Convolutional Neural Networks with Augmented Reality. Submitted to Scopus indexed De Gruyter Open Computer Science Journal.
